Single_Shot.display_help: A quick single shot from the Arachnos Sub-machinegun. Extremely accurate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Single_Shot.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

Pummel.display_help: You can smash your opponents in close combat with the butt of your sub-machine gun to deal minor smashing damage. Pummel has a high chance to disorient your foe for a brief time. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Burst.display_help: Quickly fires a Burst of rounds at a single target at long range. Damage is average, but the fire rate is fast. Can also reduce the target's defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Burst.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

WS_Wide_Area_Web_Grenade.display_help: Launches a Grenade at long range from under the barrel of your Assault rifle. It explodes into a field of sticky webs which slow and can immobilize all foes within its radius. Recharge: Long
WS_Wide_Area_Web_Grenade.display_target_help: You have been caught in a web. You cannot move or fly and your attack speed is reduced.
WS_Wide_Area_Web_Grenade.display_attacker_hit: You attempt to immobilize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}!
WS_Wide_Area_Web_Grenade.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} attempts to immobilize you with their {PowerName}!

Heavy_Burst.display_help: Fires a Heavy Burst of rounds at foes in a long cone in front of the user. Can also reduce the targets' defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT) Recharge: Medium
Heavy_Burst.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

Bayonet.display_help: Your weapon includes a bayonet attachment which you can use to stab at your enemies for lethal damage as well as causing them to bleed losing health over time. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Medium

Venom_Grenade.display_help: This poisonous grenade causes toxic damage over time and weakens the resistance of all foes within the area of effect. NOTE: If you take this power you cannot also take the Crab Spider version. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Long
Venom_Grenade.display_target_help: The poisonous gas has severely weakened your resistance to attacks.

Frag_Grenade.display_help: Launches a Frag Grenade at long range from under the barrel of your rifle. The explosion from this grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back. Note: If you take this power, you cannot take the Crab Spider version. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Medium
Frag_Grenade.display_short_help: Ranged(Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG (Lethal/Smash), Foe Knockback

BS_Bash.display_help: You Bash with your mace dealing moderate Smashing damage and minor Toxic damage over time. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Fast
BS_Bash.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Foe Disorient
BS_Bash.display_target_help: You have been disoriented and poisoned.

Mace_Beam.display_help: The Nullifier Mace has several different ranged attack modes. The Mace Beam is a moderate damage single target attack with a chance to knock a foe off their feet. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Fast

Mace_Beam_Blast.display_help: The Nullifier Mace is capable of firing a tremendous bolt of force from the end of it. The Mace Beam Blast is a Light damage area of effect attack, foes struck by the blast may be knocked back. Damage: Light Recharge: Medium
Mace_Beam_Blast.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Light DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Slow

Mace_Beam_Volley.display_help: The Nullifier Mace can fire a volley of energy at all foes in front of the user. The Mace Beam Volley is a Moderate damage area of effect cone attack with a chance to knock foes off their feet. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Medium
Mace_Beam_Volley.display_short_help: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback

Pulverize.display_help: You are capable of Pulverizing a foe with your Nullifier Mace dealing high damage, causing toxic damage over time. Pulverize will occasionally disorient foes as well. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: High Recharge: Moderate
Pulverize.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Foe Disorient
Pulverize.display_target_help: You have been disoriented and poisoned.

Poisonous_Ray.display_help: You fire a Poisonous Ray from your mace causing damage over time as reducing the target's defense. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Moderate
Poisonous_Ray.display_target_help: You have been poisoned and your defense has been reduced.

Shatter.display_help: You attempt to Shatter the bones of your opponent by striking them with all your might. This attack will deal great damage and can knock foes back a great ways. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Shatter.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), High Knockback

Placate.display_help: Allow you to trick a foe to no longer attack you. A successful Placate will also Hide you. This Hide is very brief, and offers no Defense bonus, but it will allow you to deliver a Critical Hit. However, if you attack a Placated Foe, they will be able to attack you back. Recharge: Long

Crowd_Control.display_help: You swing your mace in a wide arc in front of you. This attack strikes all foes within melee range, deals them serious damage and minor Toxic damage over time, and knocks them down. NOTE: This power may deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: High Recharge: Moderate
Crowd_Control.display_short_help: Melee (Cone), High DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Foe Knockback

Bane_Spider_Armor.display_help: Your Bane Spider Armor Upgrade improves your overall health, protection to all damage types, as well as increasing your protection against most status effects, including Confuse, Fear, Disorient, Hold, Sleep and Immobilize effects.

Hide.display_help: Cloaking Device makes you almost impossible to detect. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Like most stealth powers, Cloaking Device cannot be used at the same time as other Concealment powers.

Surveillance.display_help: When this power is activated, you focus your senses to analyze your targets defensive capabilities and discover their weaknesses. By sharing your knowledge of the targets weaknesses with your team mates, you effectively reduce their defense and resistance to damage. Recharge: Slow
Surveillance.display_target_help: Your Defense and Resistance to damage has been reduced.

Web_Cocoon.display_help: The Bane Mace can fire a more powerful version the common web grenade. The sinewy fibers of this grenade are strong enough to completely Hold one target. Targets able to resist the Hold are still likely to have their attack and movement speed dramatically slowed. Web Cocoon can also bring down flying targets and prevent foes from jumping. Recharge: Long
Web_Cocoon.display_target_help: You have been caught in a Web Cocoon and are Held. You cannot move or fly and your attack and movement speed is reduced.

Single_Shot.display_help: You fire a single blast from your Beam Rifle which deals Moderate Energy damage and has a chance to knock the target down. If the target is suffering from Disintegrate, Single Shot will reduce the target's regeneration rate slightly. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Single_Shot.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe Knockdown, Special

Charged_Shot.display_help: By charging up your Beam Rifle, you're able to launch a concentrated blast of energy at your foe to cause High Energy damage. The impact strikes with such force that it can knock your target off of their feet. Charge Shot causes additional damage if the target is suffering from Disintegration. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Charged_Shot.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Energy), Foe Knockdown, Special

Cutting_Beam.display_help: You fire a constant stream of energy from your weapon and sweep it in a broad arc blasting all foes in a wide cone in front of you. Cutting beam deals Moderate Energy damage and reduces the targets' Defense. This power will cause Minor Energy damage over time if the target is suffering from Disintegration. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long
Cutting_Beam.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by the Cutting Beam!

Disintegrate.display_help: You fire a stream of energy at your foe which causes them to slowly disintegrate and suffer High Energy damage over 10 seconds. Using Beam Rifle powers on targets affected by Disintegrate will inflict additional effects. Damage: High, Recharge: Long

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long
Aim.display_attacker_hit: You activate {PowerName} and increase the power of your next few attacks.

Lancer_Shot.display_help: You charge up your Beam Rifle and deliver an incredibly focused ray of energy that deals Superior Energy damage and will briefly stun the target. Lancer Shot will cause additional damage if the target is suffering from Disintegrate. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Lancer_Shot.display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG(Energy), Foe Stun, Special
Lancer_Shot.display_target_help: You have disoriented by the Lancer Shot's impact.

Piercing_Beam.display_help: You release a supercharged beam in a narrow cone of energy that pierces through up to 3 enemies. Piercing Beam deals High Energy damage and briefly reduces their damage resistance. If a target struck by Piercing Beam is also affected by Disintegrate it will immediately suffer additional damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Long
Piercing_Beam.display_short_help: Narrow Ranged (Cone), High DMG(Energy), Foes -Res, Special
Piercing_Beam.display_target_help: Your damage resistance has been reduced by the Piercing Beam.

Overcharge.display_help: You overcharge your Beam Rifle and release a massive blast of energy at a group of distant foes causing Extreme Energy damage, causing Minor Energy damage over time, reducing the defense of all affected foes and potentially stunning affected foes. If Overcharge strikes a target suffering from Disintegrate they will be affected by a much stronger stun. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Overcharge.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Extreme DMG(Energy), Foe Minor DoT (Energy), -Def(All), Disorient, Special
Overcharge.display_target_help: You have been disoriented and are suffering energy damage over time from the Overcharge.

Call_Swarm.display_help: You summon a swarm of stinging insects to harass your foe causing Light Lethal damage over time and reducing both their movement speed and defense. This power has a moderate chance at granting your pets a stack of Pack Mentality. Damage: Light DoT, Recharge: Very Fast
Call_Swarm.display_target_help: The swarm has reduced your defense and movement speed.

Summon_Wolves.display_help: Calls forth one to three Wolves to do your bidding. The third one summoned will be an Alpha Wolf, which grants some leadership bonuses to the pack. Wolves have no ranged attacks, but can quickly close in on their prey. You may only have 3 Wolves under your control at any given time. If you attempt to call more Wolves, you can only replace the ones you have lost in battle. If you already have three, the power will fail. Wolf attacks have a chance to build a charge of Pack Mentality. Pack Mentality is a Damage buff aura that radiates from the Mastermind and can stack up to 10 times. Recharge: Very Long

Call_Hawk.display_help: You call forth a hawk ally to swoop in and viciously peck at your target causing High Lethal damage. The attack often catches foes off their guard and can knock them down as well as reducing their chance to hit. This power has a good chance at granting your pets a stack of Pack Mentality. Damage: High, Recharge: Fast
Call_Hawk.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG (Lethal), Foe -To Hit, Knockdown, -Fly
Call_Hawk.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Hawk's attack.

Call_Ravens.display_help: You command an unkindness of ravens to quickly assault and harass your foes. Your foes will suffer Moderate Lethal damage over time and have their speed and defense reduced. This power has a high chance at granting your pets a stack of Pack Mentality. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Summon_Lions.display_help: You can summon one to two mighty lions (depending on your level). Lions are one of the most deadly predators on the planet and possess vicious claw and bite attacks as well as growl and roar buffs and debuffs. Like all Henchmen, Lions can be trained to be even more powerful. You may only have 2 Lions under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon more Lions, you can only replace the ones you have lost in battle. If you already have two, the power will fail. Lion attacks have a chance to build a charge of Pack Mentality. Pack Mentality is a Damage buff aura that radiates from the Mastermind and can stack up to 10 times. Recharge: Very Long

Fortify_Pack.display_help: You command your beasts to fight more defensively. Using Fortify Pack will prevent your pets from benefiting from Pack Mentality for 60 seconds. The number of charges of Pack Mentality you own when activating this power will determine the potency of the Defense and Regeneration buff that will be granted to your pack. Additionally, simply owning this power grants your beast pets attacks a chance to critically hit that scales with the amount of Pack Mentality owned by the Mastermind. Recharge: Very Long
Fortify_Pack.display_short_help: PBAoE, Pets +Defense, +Regeneration, consumes all charges of Pack Mentality

Summon_Dire_Wolf.display_help: You call upon the aid of the fabled Dire Wolf. It has powerful bite and breath attacks. Unlike wolves and lions, the Dire Wolf has some limited ranged attacks. The Dire Wolf has good defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks and good resistance to Cold damage. You may only have 1 Dire Wolf under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon another Dire Wolf the power will fail. Dire Wolf attacks have a chance to build a charge of Pack Mentality. Pack Mentality is a Damage buff aura that radiates from the Mastermind and can stack up to 10 times. Recharge: Very Long

Hardened_Carapace.display_help: With a little concentration you can cause your skin to become hard as stone, boosting your constitution to reject toxins and recovering from wounds more quickly. While active, this power will boost your resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Toxic damage, grant a minor amount of regeneration, and protection from Disorient and Sleep effects. If no Adaptation powers are active, Hardened Carapace will grant additional regeneration. If Defensive Adaptation is active, Hardened Carapace will grant additional resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Toxic damage. While Offensive Adaptation is active, this power will grant a minor boost to damage. Bonuses granted from Adaptations are unenhanceable. Recharge: Fast
Hardened_Carapace.display_short_help: Self Toggle, +Res(Lethal, Smash, Toxic, Disorient, Sleep), +Special
Hardened_Carapace.display_attacker_hit: You are now more resistant to Smashing, Lethal and Toxic damage as well as Sleep and Disorient effects and regenerate from damage more quickly.

Inexhaustible.display_help: Your body is constantly evolving and adapting based on your surroundings. As a result you receive a moderate bonus to maximum hit points, regeneration, recovery as well as gaining a measure of Slow and Endurance Drain Resistance. Half of this power's maximum hit point increase is unenhanceable. While Efficient Adaptation is active, this power grants a small bonus to recovery and regeneration. While Defensive Adaptation is active you gain a small amount of additional maximum hit points. This power doesn't grant any bonuses to Offensive Adaptation. These special bonuses are unenhanceable. Inexhaustible is always active.

Environmental_Adaptation.display_help: Your body can spontaneously adapt to its surroundings and your mind has learned to shield itself from harmful effects by constant exposure to these dangers. While active you gain moderate defense to Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage, and a small amount of defense to Psionic damage. Additionally you are protected against hold, knockdown and immobilize effects. While Defensive Adaptation is active you gain a minor amount of Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy and Psionic defense, as well as a minor amount of maximum hit points. If Offensive Adaptation is active you'll gain a moderate To Hit bonus. These special bonuses are unenhanceable. Recharge: Fast
Environmental_Adaptation.display_short_help: Self Toggle, +Res(Hold, Knockdown, Immobilize), +Def(Energy, Negative, Fire, Cold, Psionic), +Special
Environmental_Adaptation.display_attacker_hit: You are now less likely to be hit by Psionic, Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage and gain protection from hold, knockdown and immobilize effects.

Ablative_Carapace.display_help: When needed, you're able to cause your Bio Armor to gain a thick, but brittle outer layer that will absorb a large amount of damage before breaking off. Ablative Carapace will grant a moderate amount of damage absorption and a high amount of regeneration for a short time. While Efficient Adaptation is active, this power grants a slightly larger regeneration buff. While Defensive Adaptation is active, this power grants a bonus to damage absorption. Recharge: Long
Ablative_Carapace.display_attacker_hit: You force your Bio Armor to become incredibly dense, but brittle for a short time.

Evolving_Armor.display_help: When faced with danger, your Bio Armor reacts by becoming incredibly durable as well as infecting nearby enemies, lowering their resistance to damage. While active, Evolving Armor will grant you small amount of damage resistance, plus an additional amount for each nearby target. Nearby foes will also be taunted and have their damage resistance reduced. While Efficient Adaptation is active, this power grants a moderate bonus to Regeneration and Recovery plus a tiny amount of both for each nearby foe up to 10 foes. While Defensive Adaptation is active you gain a very minor amount of defense and damage resistance for each nearby foe. If Offensive Adaptation is active this power's damage resistance debuff is increased. These special bonuses are unenhanceable. Recharge: Slow
Evolving_Armor.display_attacker_hit: You will now gain damage resistance when engaged in melee with foes.

DNA_Siphon.display_help: You can siphon genetic material from nearby enemies, causing a minor amount of Lethal damage and a minor amount of Toxic damage over time. Living enemies will provide the user with a small boost to health and endurance. These foes will have their regeneration rate reduced for a short period of time. Defeated enemies provide a weaker sample of material and thus will boost recovery and regeneration for a short while. While Efficient Adaptation is active, this power will grant bonus regeneration and recovery per defeated target hit. While Defensive Adaptation is active, this power will grant bonus health per living target hit. While Offensive Adaptation is active this power's regeneration debuff is increased in effectiveness. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Long
DNA_Siphon.display_short_help: Click, PBAoE Minor DMG(Lethal/Toxic) Foe -Regen, Taunt, Self +HP, +End, +Special
DNA_Siphon.display_target_help: Your genetic make up has been weakened by the DNA Siphon thus reducing your regeneration.

Genetic_Contamination.display_help: You're capable of breaking down the genetic material of your foes with a powerful toxin that is produced by your Bio Armor. Nearby foes affected by this poison will suffer toxic damage over time as well as dealing reduced damage. While Defensive Adaptation is active this power's damage debuff is increased in effectiveness. Damage: Minor Recharge: Fast
Genetic_Contamination.display_target_help: The toxic cloud is breaking down your genetic material causing toxic damage over time and reducing your damage.

Parasitic_Aura.display_help: You release a cloud of parasites around you that draw out your enemies' genetic material. These parasites dramatically increase your survivability by gaining damage absorption while boosting your regeneration and recovery rate for a short time. Affected foes will be infected and deal reduced damage for a short while. While Efficient Adaptation is active, this power will grant additional regeneration and recovery per target hit. While Defensive Adaptation is active, this power will grant a small amount of additional damage absorption and increase the effectiveness of this power's damage debuff. Recharge: Very Long

Initial_Strike.display_help: You deliver a pair of lightning fast blows to your opponent in an effort to throw them off balance. Initial Strike deals Light Smashing damage and has a small chance to disorient your target. Initial Strike is a Combo Builder and adds 1 Combo Level. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
Initial_Strike.display_short_help: Melee, Light DMG (Smash), Foe Disorient, Combo Builder

Heavy_Blow.display_help: You strike your foe with a powerful punch dealing Moderate Smashing damage. Heavy Blow has a fair chance to knock the target off its feet. Heavy Blow is a Combo Builder and adds 1 Combo Level. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Heavy_Blow.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Smash), Foe Knockdown, Combo Builder

Throwing_Knives.display_help: With your natural origin you have to rely on your cunning and skill. You've acquired these throwing knives as part of your personal arsenal. You can throw these knives at a very short range, and deal minor Lethal damage to your target, but a nasty wound will do additional Damage over Time. Damage: Minor (DoT), Recharge: Fast
Throwing_Knives.display_target_help: You are taking additional Damage over Time from the wound left by the Throwing Knife.

Sweeping_Cross.display_help: You execute a sweeping right hook that can strike multiple targets in your frontal arc. Sweeping Cross deals High Smashing damage and can disorient foes. Sweeping Cross is a Finisher and sets your current Combo Level to 0. It will deal additional damage and have a greater chance to disorient dependent upon the current Combo Level. At Combo Level 3, Sweeping Cross will also have a chance to knock down the affected targets. Critical damage is unaffected by your Combo Level. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Sweeping_Cross.display_short_help: Melee (Cone), High DMG (Smash), Foe Disorient, Finisher

Combat_Readiness.display_help: Activating this power will increase your chance to hit and the amount of damage you deal for a short amount of time as well as setting your current Combo Level to 3. Recharge: Long

Throat_Strike.display_help: You deftly strike your foe in a very vulnerable location. Rib Cracker deals Moderate Damage but reduces your foe's Damage and Resistance moderately for a short time. Rib Cracker is a Combo Builder and adds 1 Combo Level. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast.
Throat_Strike.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Smash), Foe -Res (All), -Dmg, Combo Builder

Spinning_Strike.display_help: You execute a spinning attack that first strikes with your fist and finally your heel hitting your foe and all enemies immediately nearby. Spinning Strike deals Heavy Smashing damage and has a high chance to knockdown foes. Spinning Strike is a Finisher and sets your current Combo Level to 0. It will deal additional damage and have a greater chance to knockdown dependent upon the current Combo Level. At Combo Level 3, Spinning Strike also has a moderate chance to briefly inflict Terrorize in nearby foes. Critical damage is unaffected by your Combo Level. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Spinning_Strike.display_short_help: Melee (Targeted AoE), Heavy DMG (Smash), Foe Knockdown, Finisher

Low_Kick.display_help: You execute a quick but powerful kick targeting your foe's leg in an attempt to cripple their movement. Shin Breaker deals Superior Smashing damage and moderately reduces your target's movement speed and defense for a short time. Shin Breaker is a Combo Builder and adds 1 Combo Level. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Low_Kick.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG (Smash), Foe -Speed, -Defense, Combo Builder
Low_Kick.display_target_help: The Shin Breaker has reduced your movement speed as well as your defense.

Crushing_Uppercut.display_help: You perform a jaw breaking Crushing Uppercut on your target inflicting Extreme Smashing damage and knocking them into the air. Crushing Uppercut will leave the target disoriented for a short time. Crushing Uppercut is a Finisher and will set your Combo Level to 0. It will deal additional damage and have a longer disorient duration dependent upon the current Combo level. At Combo Level 3, Crushing Uppercut will have its disorient effect upgraded to a Hold effect. Critical damage is unaffected by your Combo Level. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Crushing_Uppercut.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG (Smash), Foe Knock Up, Disorient, Finisher

Channelgun.display_help: Your backpack has a built in energy Longfang Channelgun which fires bolts of energy. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Fast
Channelgun.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the energy bursts.

Slice.display_help: The arms of your backpack may be used to slice at opponents for moderate lethal damage, as well as reducing their defense. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Medium
Slice.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Claws.

Longfang.display_help: Your Longfang Channelgun may also fire short bursts, causing greater damage. This attack also reduces your foe's defense. Damage: High Recharge: Medium
Longfang.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the energy bursts.

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases your chance to hit with attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

Suppression.display_help: Your Longfang Channelgun may also fire long bursts of energy, causing moderate damage in an large cone in front of you. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Medium
Suppression.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the energy bursts.

Arm_Lash.display_help: The Crab Spider's backpack is capable of making rapid attacks with its many arms dealing heavy damage to foes within a short cone in front of the user. Damage: Heavy Recharge: Medium

CS_Venom_Grenade.display_help: This poisonous grenade causes toxic damage over time and weakens the resistance of all foes within the area of effect. NOTE: If you take this power you cannot also take the Wolf Spider version. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Long
CS_Venom_Grenade.display_target_help: The poisonous gas has severely weakened your resistance to attacks.

CS_Frag_Grenade.display_help: Launches an M30 Grenade at long range from an arm of your backpack. The explosion from this grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back. Note: If you take this power, you cannot take the Wolf Spider version. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Medium
CS_Frag_Grenade.display_short_help: Ranged(Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG (Lethal/Smash), Foe Knockback

Frenzy.display_help: You can energize and lash out with your arms, causing both lethal and energy damage to all foes surrounding you. This attack also weakens the Defense of those struck. Damage: Heavy Recharge: Moderate
Frenzy.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the {Powername}.

Omega_Maneuver.display_help: You may use the Arachnos Teleportation system to summon an Omega Bomb in the midst of your enemies. The Omega Bomb immediately sends out a short range psionic signal and hypnotic light display to draw the attention of those nearby, causing them to approach the device. Then it detonates, causing massive damage to all enemies in a wide radius. Damage: Superior Recharge: Long
Omega_Maneuver.display_short_help: Summon Omega Bomb: Ranged (Location Targeted AoE), Superior DMG (Smashing/Energy), Foe Disorient

Crab_Spider_Armor.display_help: Your Crab Spider Armor Upgrade improves your protection to Smashing, Lethal and Psionic damage types, as well as increasing your protection against most status effects, including Confuse, Fear, Disorient, Hold, Sleep and Immobilize effects.
Crab_Spider_Armor.display_short_help: Auto: Self +RES(Smash, Lethal, Psionic, Status Effects)

Fortification.display_help: Crab Spiders armor may be reinforced to become far more resistant to all types of damage except Psionics, as well as increasing protection to Sleep, Hold, Immobilization and Disorient effects. Recharge: Fast
Fortification.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Sleep, All DMG but Psionics)

Serum.display_help: You can activate this power to increase your maximum Hit Points for a short time. Recharge: Very Long
Serum.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your maximum Hit Points.

Summon_Spiderlings.display_help: As a Crab Spider you have access to a small squadron of Arachnobot Spiderlings. Three Spiderlings that are two levels less than you will show up when summoned. Recharge: Extremely Long

Shadowy_Binds.display_help: You take control of your victim's shadow causing it to entangle and bind its owner thus leaving them immobilized and suffering from negative energy damage over time and reducing their chance to hit. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Shadowy_Binds.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DoT(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit, -Fly
Shadowy_Binds.display_target_help: You have been entangled by Shadowy Binds and have been left immobilized.

Dark_Grasp.display_help: You cause your target's shadow to wholly envelop them, leaving them held and rendered helpless while suffering from moderate negative energy damage. Even if the target is powerful enough to resist the power's hold effect they will have their chance to hit reduced. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Dark_Grasp.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe Hold, -To Hit
Dark_Grasp.display_target_help: The Penumbral Grasp has stopped you in your tracks!

Living_Shadows.display_help: You extend and animate your own shadow causing it to entangle all foes within a long cone pattern in front of you, rendering all affected foes immobilized. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Living_Shadows.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Minor DoT(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit, -Fly
Living_Shadows.display_target_help: The Living Shadows are holding you immobile and reducing your chance to hit.

Possess.display_help: You cause your targeted foe to be possessed by a dark entity from the Netherworld causing them to be confused for a short period of time. While confused they will be unable to tell the difference between friend or foe and will attack nearby allies. Recharge: Moderate
Possess.display_target_help: You have been confused and may attack an incorrect target.

Fearsome_Stare.display_help: Instills tremendous Fear within a cone area in front of you, causing all affected targets to tremble in Terror uncontrollably. Recharge: Slow
Fearsome_Stare.display_target_help: The Fearsome Stare has terrified you and reduced your chance to hit.

Heart_of_Darkness.display_help: In a burst of negative energy you overwhelm the minds of those around you causing them to be disoriented and suffer minor negative energy damage over a short time. Affected targets will also have their chance to hit reduced. Damage: Minor (DoT), Recharge: Very Long
Heart_of_Darkness.display_short_help: PBAoE, Foe Disorient, -To Hit, Minor DoT(Negative)

Haunt.display_help: You summon a pair of Shades from the Netherworld to harass your target foe. Shades deal moderate damage and they terrorize their victims. Recharge: Very Long

Shadow_Field.display_help: You blanket a targeted area in darkness. Any foe who enters this area will have their chance to hit reduced and has a chance to be held for a short period of time. Recharge: Slow
Shadow_Field.display_target_help: You are rendered held by the Shadow Field.

Umbra_Beast.display_help: You conjure up one of the most fearsome creatures of the Netherworld, the Umbra Beast. This creature will fight beside its summoner using its brutal claw, bite and darkness attacks. Recharge: Very Long

FRT_Mask_Presence.display_help: Mask Presence makes you almost impossible to detect. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Like most stealth powers, Mask Presence cannot be used at the same time as other Concealment powers.

FRT_Mind_Link.display_help: Your Mind Link Power will enable you to link the minds of all your teammates who are near you for the next 90 seconds. This shared link improves your team's chance to hit foes, your defensive abilities and dramatically reduces psionic damage. Recharge: Long
FRT_Mind_Link.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, Defense and Psionic Resistance improve due to the Mind Link.
FRT_Mind_Link.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's chance to hit, Defense and Psionic Resistance.
FRT_Mind_Link.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's chance to hit, Defense and Psionic Resistance with their {PowerName}.

Confuse.display_help: You can Confuse an enemy, forcing him to believe his friends are not who they appear to be. If successful, the enemy will ignore you and attack his own allies. If you Confuse someone before he has noticed you, your presence will continue to be masked. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated entirely by a Confused enemy. Recharge: Moderate
Confuse.display_target_help: You have been confused and may attack an incorrect target.
Confuse.display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} {PlayerDest} causing them to attack their allies!
Confuse.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} confuses you causing you to attack your own allies!

FRT_Tactical_Training:_Vengeance.display_help: The loss of a comrade enrages the team. When a teammate is defeated in combat, activate this power to grant you and your teammates a bonus to chance to hit, Damage and Defense to all attacks. A Vengeful team has no fear, and Vengeance protects you and your Teammates from Fear effects. It also gives you and your team great resistance to Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Immobilize, Confuse, Taunt, Placate and Knockback. This power does not stack with multiple castings.
FRT_Tactical_Training:_Vengeance.display_target_help: You have been inspired to Vengeance by a natural leader. Your chance to hit, Damage and Defense to melee, ranged, smashing and lethal attacks are all increased and you are resistant to Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Immobilize, Confuse, Taunt, Placate and Knockback.
FRT_Tactical_Training:_Vengeance.display_victim_hit: You fallen teammate has inspired you with {PowerName}.

Aura_of_Confusion.display_help: Aura of Confusion can cause chaos within a group of foes. All affected foes within the area will turn and attack each other, ignoring the user and their allies. If you confuse a foe before they noticed you, your presence will continue to go unnoticed. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated entirely by confused enemies. Recharge: Very Long
Aura_of_Confusion.display_target_help: You are confused and may attack an incorrect target.
Aura_of_Confusion.display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} {PlayerDest} causing them to attack their allies!
Aura_of_Confusion.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} confuses you causing you to attack your own allies!

FRT_Mental_Blast.display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
FRT_Mental_Blast.display_target_help: The Mental Blast has slowed your Attack rate.

FRT_Telekinetic_Blast.display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

FRT_Subdue.display_help: Subdue deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
FRT_Subdue.display_target_help: You have been Subdued and are being held immobile.

FRT_Aim.display_help: Greatly increases your chance to hit with attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

FRT_Psychic_Scream.display_help: This howl of Psionic energy resonates in the minds of all foes within its conical area of effect, inflicting moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
FRT_Psychic_Scream.display_target_help: The Psychic Scream has reduced your Attack rate.

FRT_Dominate.display_help: Painfully tears at the mind of a single foe. Dominate deals Psionic damage and renders a foe helpless, lost in his own mind and unable to defend himself. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
FRT_Dominate.display_attacker_hit: You dominate the mind of {PlayerDest} holding them!

FRT_Psionic_Lance.display_help: Unleashes a whirlwind of Psionic energy on a target, tossing nearby foes into the air. The Psionic Tornado damages foes and Slows their attack speed. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
FRT_Psionic_Lance.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DoT(Psionic), Foe Knockback
FRT_Psionic_Lance.display_target_help: You are taking psionic damage over time.

FRT_Scramble_Thoughts.display_help: Painfully scrambles the synapses of a targeted foe, leaving him dramatically Disoriented for a short duration. Deals a little Psionic Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

FRT_Total_Domination.display_help: Tears at the mind of a target foe and those near him. Total Domination renders all affected foes helpless, lost in their own minds and unable to defend themselves. Recharge: Very Long
FRT_Total_Domination.display_attacker_hit: You dominate the mind of {PlayerDest} holding them!

FRT_Psychic_Wail.display_help: Psychic Wail is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Those that survive will have a severely reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
FRT_Psychic_Wail.display_target_help: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.

Power_Siphon.display_help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

Corrosive_Enzymes.display_help: You spray a target with toxic, corrosive Enzymes reducing the damage they deal as well as their damage resistance. Recharge: Slow
Corrosive_Enzymes.display_target_help: Your damage dealt and damage resistance have been reduced by the Corrosive Enzymes!
Corrosive_Enzymes.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has reduced {PlayerDest}'s resistances and damage output.
Corrosive_Enzymes.display_victim_hit: Your damage dealt and resistance to damage has been reduced by the {PowerName} of {PlayerSource}.

Regrowth.display_help: By channeling the energies present in nature you are able to immediately heal yourself and allies in front of you for a small amount of health and cause them to recover a small amount of health over time. Regrowth places a stack of Bloom on its target. Recharge: Moderate
Regrowth.display_short_help: Ranged Facing Cone, Minor Ally Heal, Ally Moderate Healing Over Time, +1 Bloom
Regrowth.display_target_help: The Regrowth effect is causing you to recover a small amount of hit points over time.

Wild_Growth.display_help: You channel the power of nature into your allies allowing them to more easily shrug off damage and causing their wounds to heal more quickly. Wild Growth increases the damage resistance and boosts the regeneration rate of all affected allies. This power also grants 2 stacks of Bloom. Recharge: Very Long
Wild_Growth.display_target_help: Your damage resistance and regeneration rate has been increased by Wild Growth!
Wild_Growth.display_attacker_hit: You imbue your allies with the power of nature increasing their damage resistance and regeneration rate.
Wild_Growth.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} boosts your damage resistance and regeneration rate moderately with their {PowerName}!

Spore_Cloud.display_help: You create a large cloud of toxic spores around your targeted foe. The target and all nearby foes will have their damage output, chance to hit and regeneration rate reduced. Recharge: Long
Spore_Cloud.display_target_help: The Spore Cloud is reducing your damage, chance to hit and regeneration rate!
Spore_Cloud.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} weakens {PlayerDest} and all nearby foes.
Spore_Cloud.display_victim_hit: You have been weakened by a {PowerName} from {PlayerSource}, decreasing your chance to hit, damage and regeneration.

Lifegiving_Spores.display_help: When activating this power you cause all allies at a selected location to recover a small amount of health and endurance every few seconds as long as they remain within the Lifegiving Spores. Recharge: Very Fast
Lifegiving_Spores.display_short_help: Toggle (Location AoE), PBAoE +Minor Heal Over Time, +Endurance
Lifegiving_Spores.display_target_help: While you stand within the Lifegiving Spores you will recover a small amount of health and endurance every few seconds.

Wild_Bastion.display_help: You encase yourself and nearby allies in a protective barrier that will absorb a moderate amount of damage. Additionally, affected allies will heal for a portion of their health over time. Wild Bastion places 3 stacks of Bloom on all affected targets. Recharge: Very Long
Wild_Bastion.display_attacker_hit: You shield nearby allies in your {PowerName} granting them a measure of damage absorption and causing them to heal over time.
Wild_Bastion.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} infuses you with nature's power granting you a measure of damage absorption and causing you to heal over time.

Rebirth.display_help: Rebirth can either greatly heal a conscious ally for a large amount of health over time or it can revive a fallen ally with a large amount of health and endurance and cause them to recover health over time. This power also grants 3 stacks of Bloom. Recharge: Very Long
Rebirth.display_short_help: Ranged, Ally Rez, +Heal Over Time, Special, +3 Bloom
Rebirth.display_target_help: You have been revived and are recovering health over time.

Raging_Tempest.display_help: While this power is active there is a high chance that entangling vines will grasp nearby foes and render them held for a short time. Recharge: Fast.
Raging_Tempest.display_target_help: Standing in the Entangling Aura can render you held.
Raging_Tempest.display_attacker_hit: You surround yourself in a Entangling Aura. Enemies who get too close may be held.

Overgrowth.display_help: Becoming a conduit of nature itself, you greatly boost the damage, to hit and endurance discount of nearby allies for a long period of time. Overgrowth also grants the affected targets 5 stacks of Bloom. Recharge: Very Long
Overgrowth.display_target_help: Overgrowth has greatly increased your damage, chance to hit and also granted you an endurance cost discount.
Overgrowth.display_attacker_hit: You greatly increase the damage output, chance to hit of nearby allies as well as granting them an endurance cost discount for a short time.
Overgrowth.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your damage, chance to hit and grants you an endurance discount.

NW_Mental_Blast.display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
NW_Mental_Blast.display_target_help: The Mental Blast has slowed your Attack rate.

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Note: If you select this power, you may not also select Follow Up. Recharge: Long

NW_Smoke_Grenade.display_help: The Smoke Grenade envelops all those in the affected area in a cloud of smoke. Most villains will not be able to see past normal melee range, although some may have better perception. If the villains are attacked, they will be alerted to your presence, but will suffer a penalty to their chance to hit. Recharge: Slow
NW_Smoke_Grenade.display_target_help: Your visual range and chance to hit have been reduced by the Smoke Grenade.
NW_Smoke_Grenade.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} hits {PlayerDest} slightly reducing their chance to hit and dramatically reducing their perception!
NW_Smoke_Grenade.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with a {PowerName} slightly decreasing your chance to hit and dramatically reducing your perception!

NW_Slash.display_help: Slash does extreme lethal damage to your foe, then poisons them. The poison does toxic damage over time and slows their recovery rate and movement speed. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Night Widow or Fortunata Mask Presence power. Damage: Extreme Recharge: Slow
NW_Slash.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

NW_Eviscerate.display_help: Eviscerate does superior lethal damage to your foe, then poisons them. The poison does toxic damage over time and slows their recovery rate and movement speed. NOTE: This power may deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Night Widow or Fortunata Mask Presence power. Damage: Superior Recharge: Very Slow
NW_Eviscerate.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

NW_Psychic_Scream.display_help: This howl of Psionic energy resonates in the minds of all foes within its conical area of effect, inflicting moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
NW_Psychic_Scream.display_target_help: The Psychic Scream has reduced your Attack rate.

Mercurial_Blow.display_help: You strike your foe with a lightning fast blow from your staff dealing Light Smashing damage. The attack is so unexpected that the target's defenses are reduced slightly for a short time. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: Light, Recharge: Fast
Mercurial_Blow.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by Mercurial Blow.

Precise_Strike.display_help: You attempt to daze your foe with a heavy staff blow to their head. Precise Strike has a higher chance to hit than normal, deals Moderate Smashing damage, and has a small chance to disorient the target briefly. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast.

Serpents_Reach.display_help: You fully extend your staff and release a burst of energy to lash out at a distant target and deal High Smashing damage with a good chance to knock your target down. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: High, Recharge: Long

Guarded_Spin.display_help: You spin your staff like a propeller in front of you dealing Light Smashing damage to enemies in your frontal arc and deflecting any incoming attacks, thus boosting your Melee and Lethal damage briefly. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Guarded_Spin.display_target_help: Your Guarded Spin has increased your defense moderately.

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Eye_of_the_Storm.display_help: With a lightning fast series of spins of your staff you strike at all nearby foes dealing moderate damage with a chance of knocking foes down. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection if the user has two or less levels, if the user has three levels of Perfection it will consume them and gain some benefit. 3 Levels of Perfection of Body will cause additional smashing damage and reduce damage resistance slightly for a short time. 3 Levels of Perfection of Mind will cause additional psionic damage and reduce attack and movement speed for a short time. 3 Levels of Perfection of Soul will cause additional energy damage and reduce defense for a short time. Critical Hit damage isn't enhanced by levels of Perfection. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long
Eye_of_the_Storm.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockdown, Consumes Perfection
Eye_of_the_Storm.display_target_help: Eye of the Storm has been empowered by the user's Perfection levels causing it to have lingering effects.

Innocuous_Strikes.display_help: You repeatedly batter your foes' feet and legs with a flurry of sweeps of your staff. This attack deals Moderate Smashing damage to all foes within its cone. All affected targets will have their movement speed reduced, with a chance of being immobilized briefly. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: High, Recharge: Long
Innocuous_Strikes.display_short_help: Melee Cone, High DMG(Smash), Foe Immobilize, -Speed
Innocuous_Strikes.display_target_help: Your movement speed has been reduced!

Sky_Splitter.display_help: You leap into the air and hammer your foe with an overhead bash from your staff. Sky Splitter deals Extreme Smashing damage, will knock the target off their feet and leave them held briefly. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection if the user has two or less levels, if the user has three levels of Perfection it will consume them and gain some benefit. 3 Levels of Perfection of Body will cause additional smashing damage and grant the user a bonus to damage resistance a short time. 3 Levels of Perfection of Mind will cause additional psionic damage and boost the user's chance to hit for a short time. 3 Levels of Perfection of Soul will cause additional energy damage and increase the user's regeneration and recovery rate briefly. Critical Hit damage isn't enhanced by levels of Perfection. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Sky_Splitter.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Smash), Foe Knockdown, Disorient, Consumes Perfection

Combat_Training:_Defensive.display_help: You are more evasive to melee attacks.

Tactical_Training:_Maneuvers.display_help: A good leader knows how to protect his team. While active, this power increases the Defense of yourself and all nearby teammates to all attacks.
Tactical_Training:_Maneuvers.display_target_help: Your Defense to all attacks is improved due to good teamwork and leadership.

Indomitable_Will.display_help: When you toggle on this power, it grants protection from Sleep, Disorient, Fear, Immobilize, Confusions, Repel, Knockback and Hold effects. Indomitable Will also grants moderate resistance to Psionic based attacks. Recharge: Fast
Indomitable_Will.display_short_help: Toggle: Self Res (Psionics, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Sleep, Fear, Confuse, Repel, Knockback).
Indomitable_Will.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} protects you from Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient, and Hold effects and improves your resistance to psionic damage.

Tactical_Training:_Assault.display_help: While this power is active, you and your nearby teammates deal more damage and are more resistant to Taunt and Placate.
Tactical_Training:_Assault.display_target_help: Your attack damage is improved due to good leadership and teamwork. You are resistant to Taunt and Placate.
Tactical_Training:_Assault.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.
Tactical_Training:_Assault.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.

Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_help: While this power is active, your chance to hit and that of all your nearby teammates' is increased. Your advanced Tactics also protect you and your team from Confuse and Fear effects, as well as your Perception so you can detect Stealthy foes.
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Team +To Hit, Res(Confuse, Fear), +Perception
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_target_help: Your chance to hit and Perception is improved due to good teamwork and Leadership.
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_attacker_hit: Your Tactical Training increases your team's chance to hit and Perception.
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's chance to hit and Perception with their Tactical Training.

Foresight.display_help: Widows who possess Foresight are resistant to Psionic Damage, as well as Sleep, Hold, Immobilization, Disorient, Confuse and Fear effects. Their precognition becomes clearer in times of duress, providing resistance to all damage types based on their current health, as well. They also have improved Defense, due to being able to see attacks slightly before they actually occur.
Foresight.display_short_help: Auto: Self Res (Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Sleep, Fear, Confuse, Psionics, Special), +Def (all)

Time_Crawl.display_help: You're able to dramatically slow the time around a single enemy, reducing their movement speed and attack rate. Time is slowed to such an extreme that their wounds will take longer to heal, reducing their regeneration rate. Time Crawl applies the Delayed effect on its target. Debuff and control effects from other Time Manipulation powers are increased on targets affected by Delayed. Recharge: Long.
Time_Crawl.display_target_help: Your attack rate, movement speed and regeneration rate have been reduced

Temporal_Mending.display_help: You mend the wounds of yourself and nearby allies by placing your bodies in a past or future state where they are far less injured. Temporal Mending will immediately heal its targets and continue to heal them for an equal amount over the next 6 seconds. Additionally, affected allies will gain some resistance to slow effects and regeneration debuffs. Allies affected by the Accelerated effect will receive additional healing from this power. Temporal Mending will apply a regeneration bonus instead of heal over time for a short while if the user is in a PvP zone. Recharge: Long
Temporal_Mending.display_short_help: PBAoE, Ally +Heal, Heal Over Time, +Res(Slow, Regen Debuff)

Times_Juncture.display_help: You create a time dilation field around you causing enemies who get too close to be slowed to a crawl, their movement speed, damage and chance to hit will be decreased substantially. Enemies affected by Delayed have these affects increased. Recharge: Slow
Times_Juncture.display_target_help: The flow of time has been dramatically slowed around the foe using Time's Juncture reducing your damage, speed and chance to hit.
Times_Juncture.display_attacker_hit: You reduce the damage, movement speed and chance to hit of all nearby foes with your {PowerName}.
Times_Juncture.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your damage, speed and chance to hit with their {PowerName}!

Temporal_Selection.display_help: You distort time around an ally, selecting a period of time where their abilities are at their highest. Their damage, attack rate and regeneration rates are dramatically increased for a brief period. This power places the Accelerated effect on the target. While this is in effect, the target has any healing and healing over time effects from Temporal Mending or Chrono Shift significantly increased. Recharge: Very Long
Temporal_Selection.display_target_help: Your movements have been sped up as if you're flowing more quickly through time. You gain a significant bonus to your damage, recharge rate and regeneration.
Temporal_Selection.display_attacker_hit: You significantly increase {PlayerDest}'s damage, recharge rate and regeneration for a short time.
Temporal_Selection.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} greatly increases your Damage, Recharge Rate and Regeneration.

Distortion_Field.display_help: You can choose an area to slow the flow of time down to a crawl. Enemies who enter the field will have their attack rate and speed slowed dramatically. In addition, affected enemies might become held as they are frozen in time. Targets affected by Time Crawl will have the chance to be held increased. Recharge: Very Long
Distortion_Field.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Foe(-Recharge, -Speed), Chance for Hold
Distortion_Field.display_target_help: The Distortion Field has reduced your Recharge and Movement Speed.
Distortion_Field.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduces your targets' Movement and Recharge Speed.

Time_Stop.display_help: You trap your target within the flow of time causing them to be held helpless. Even those resistant to the effects of Time Stop's hold will still have their regeneration rate and healing effects reduced for a brief period. Targets affected by Time Crawl will suffer from a more powerful hold, however its benefits are brief. Recharge: Long
Time_Stop.display_target_help: You have been held by Time Stop. Your healing effects and regeneration rate have also been reduced.

Farsight.display_help: You give your allies a brief glimpse of the future and what is to come. This provides you and your team a moderate increase to your chance to hit and defense for a short period of time. Recharge: Very Long
Farsight.display_target_help: You have brief glimpses of the future allowing you to predict your foes' movements. Your Defense, Perception and Chance to Hit is increased briefly.
Farsight.display_attacker_hit: You grant your allies the ability to briefly glimpse into the future thus increasing their Defense, Perception and Chance to Hit.
Farsight.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} boosts your Defense, Perception and Chance to Hit with {PowerName}.

Slowed_Response.display_help: You manipulate time around a targeted foe causing their reflexes to become slowed and sluggish. This causes them to have decreased defense and damage resistance. A target affected by Time Crawl will suffer from a more powerful effect. Recharge: Very Long
Slowed_Response.display_target_help: Your defense and resistance has been lowered by Slowed Response.
Slowed_Response.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduces the defenses and resistances of your target and nearby foes.
Slowed_Response.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your defense and resistances with their {PowerName}

Chrono_Shift.display_help: You cause nearby allies to act more quickly by allowing them to slip through the time stream seamlessly. When Chrono Shift is activated, you and nearby allies will immediately recover a portion of your health and endurance. Chrono Shift will greatly increase the Recharge Speed of nearby allies for the duration of the power, additionally for a short while the flow of time will constantly undo a portion of your allies' wounds causing them to periodically recover health and recover endurance. An ally affected by Temporal Selection will recover additional health from Chrono Shift. Chrono Shift will apply a regeneration bonus instead of heal over time for a short while if the user is in a PvP zone. Recharge: Very Long
Chrono_Shift.display_short_help: PBAoE, Team +Recharge, Heal, +End, Moderate Healing over Time, +Recovery

Defensive_Sweep.display_help: You take a defensive stance and strike your opponent. Successfully executing this attack will cause light smashing damage to your opponent, while giving you increased defense against their melee attacks. Damage: Light, Recharge: Fast
Defensive_Sweep.display_target_help: Your Defense has been increased by your Defensive Sweep.

Crushing_Blow.display_help: You swing a mighty crushing blow at your opponent dealing High Smashing damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Throwing_Knives.display_help: With your natural origin you have to rely on your cunning and skill. You've acquired these throwing knives as part of your personal arsenal. You can throw these knives at a very short range, and deal minor Lethal damage to your target, but a nasty wound will do additional Damage over Time. Damage: Minor (DoT), Recharge: Fast
Throwing_Knives.display_target_help: You are taking additional Damage over Time from the wound left by the Throwing Knife.

Follow_Through.display_help: You Follow Through with a massive attack dealing Superior Smashing damage, knocking your opponent down and possibly stunning them. Additionally, Follow Through can cause the target to suffer a small amount of Lethal damage over time. NOTE: Follow Through requires Momentum in order to be activated. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Long
Follow_Through.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Smashing), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), Knockdown, Stun, Requires Momentum

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Sweeping_Strike.display_help: You make a sweeping slash with your weapon, causing high damage and possibly knocking your opponent down. Damage: High, Recharge: Long

Shatter_Armor.display_help: You batter your enemy with your mighty weapon dealing Extreme Smashing damage and reducing their resistance to damage as well as their defense to all types of attacks for a short time. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
Shatter_Armor.display_target_help: You are bruised and dazed, which reduces your damage resistance and defense.

Whirling_Slice.display_help: You perform a powerful Whirling Smash that deals Moderate Smashing damage, and can knock an opponent down. Additionally, Whirling Smash can cause the target to suffer a small amount of Lethal damage over time. NOTE: Whirling Smash requires Momentum in order to be activated. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Whirling_Slice.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smashing), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), Knockdown, Requires Momentum

Arc_of_Destruction.display_help: You swing your weapon in a devastating Arc of Destruction that deals Superior Smashing damage and has a good chance to knock foes down. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Wolf_Spider_Armor.display_help: Your Wolf Spider Armor provides good protection to Smashing, Lethal and Psionic damage types, as well as offering basic levels of protection to most status effects, including Confuse, Fear, Disorient, Hold, Sleep and Immobilize effects.
Wolf_Spider_Armor.display_short_help: Auto: Self +RES(Smash, Lethal, Psionic, Status Effects)

Combat_Training:_Defensive.display_help: You are more evasive to ranged attacks.

Tactical_Training:_Maneuvers.display_help: A good leader knows how to protect his team. While active, this power increases the Defense of yourself and all nearby teammates to all attacks. Recharge: Slow
Tactical_Training:_Maneuvers.display_target_help: Your Defense to all attacks is improved due to good teamwork and leadership.

Tactical_Training:_Assault.display_help: While this power is active, you and your nearby teammates deal more damage and are more resistant to Taunt and Placate.
Tactical_Training:_Assault.display_target_help: Your attack damage is improved due to good leadership and teamwork. You are resistant to Taunt and Placate.
Tactical_Training:_Assault.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.
Tactical_Training:_Assault.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.

Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_help: While this power is active, your chance to hit and that of all your nearby teammates' is increased. Your advanced Tactics also protect you and your team from Confuse and Fear effects. Additionally, your Perception is improved, allowing you to better detect Stealthy foes.
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Team +To Hit, Res(Confuse, Fear), +Perception
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_target_help: Your chance to hit and Perception is improved due to good teamwork and Leadership. You have moderate protection against Fear and Confuse effects, as well.
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_attacker_hit: Your Tactical Training increases your team's chance to hit and Perception.
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's chance to hit and Perception with their Tactical Training.

Mental_Training.display_help: Your mental training allows you to focus your will, allowing you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.
Mental_Training.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.

Call_Reinforcements.display_help: As an Arachnos Soldier you have access to a small squadron of Arachnobot Disruptors. Two Disruptors that are one level less than you will show up when summoned. Recharge: Extremely Long

Aqua_Bolt.display_help: You strike your foe with a rapid blast of freezing cold water causing Light Cold and Smashing damage as well as reducing their defense. Aqua Bolt builds 1 Tidal Power. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
Aqua_Bolt.display_short_help: Ranged, Light DMG(Cold/Smash), Foe -Def, Self +Tidal Power
Aqua_Bolt.display_target_help: Your defense is reduced by the Aqua Bolt.

Hydro_Blast.display_help: You briefly focus before releasing an intense blast of chilling water at your foe that causes High Cold and Smashing damage. Affected foes will have their movement speed reduced briefly and have a chance to be knocked down. Hydro Blast builds 1 Tidal Power. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Hydro_Blast.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Cold/Smash), Foe -Speed, Knockdown, Self +Tidal Power
Hydro_Blast.display_target_help: Your movement speed has been reduced by the Hydro Blast!

Water_Burst.display_help: You cause water to violently explode from beneath your target's feet blasting all foes nearby with freezing cold water. Affected targets will suffer Moderate Cold and Smashing damage, have their movement speed reduced and may be knocked down by the force of the blast. Water Burst consumes all Tidal Power. It will deal additional cold damage and have a greater chance to knockdown for each stack of Tidal Power. If you have 3 stacks of Tidal Power Water Burst will have a 100% chance to knock the targets into the air. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Water_Burst.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Cold/Smash), Foe -Speed, Knockdown, Self -Tidal Power
Water_Burst.display_target_help: Your movement speed has been reduced by the Water Burst!

Whirlpool.display_help: You create a violent whirlpool at the target location causing Cold damage over time, reducing the targets' speed and defense for a short time. Whirlpool grants 1 stack of Tidal Power. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Long
Whirlpool.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), High DoT(Cold), -Speed, -Defense, Self +Tidal Power
Whirlpool.display_target_help: The whirlpool reduces the defense and movement speed of its victims.

Tidal_Forces.display_help: You draw tidal energies into yourself thus boosting your chance to hit significantly, slightly boosting your damage and granting yourself +3 Tidal Power. Recharge: Very Long

Dehydrate.display_help: You rapidly dehydrate your target, causing Moderate Cold and Smashing damage, reducing their movement speed and defense as well as causing a measure of Cold damage over time. You are then healed over time for a moderate amount of health. Dehydrate grants 1 stack of Tidal Power if you have 2 or less. Dehydrate will consume all stacks of Tidal Power if you have 3, but the power's heal over time effect is increased by 50%. Damage: Moderate, Light DoT, Recharge: Moderate
Dehydrate.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Cold/Smash), Foe -Speed, -Defense, Light DoT(Cold), Self +Heal Over Time, +Tidal Power
Dehydrate.display_target_help: Your movement speed and defense has been reduced by the Dehydrate!

Water_Jet.display_help: You spray a concentrated torrent of water at short range toward your target that causes High Cold and Smashing damage as well as reducing your target's movement speed. If you have 2 or less Tidal Power, you will gain a stack of Tidal Power. If you have 3 Tidal Power and you activate this power, it will have an enhanced effect causing Water Jet to cast slightly faster and immediately reset the recharge of Water Jet. Water Jet's enhanced effect can be used once every 8 seconds. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Water_Jet.display_short_help: Short, High DMG(Cold/Smash), Foe -Speed, Self +/-Tidal Power
Water_Jet.display_target_help: Your speed is reduced by the Water Jet.

Steam_Spray.display_help: You spray scalding hot steam in a cone in front of you badly burning affected targets. Steam Spray causes Moderate Fire damage, Minor Fire damage over time and reduces the target's Defense slightly. Steam Spray grants 1 stack of Tidal Power. Damage: High, Recharge: Long
Steam_Spray.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), High DMG(Fire), Foe -Defense, Minor DoT(Fire), Self +Tidal Power
Steam_Spray.display_target_help: You are burning from the Steam Spray and your defense is reduced!

Geyser.display_help: You cause the earth to erupt beneath your target's feet as a Geyser of scalding hot water burns your foes and tosses them violently into the air. Geyser causes High Fire and Smashing damage before causing High Fire damage over time as well as reducing their movement speed. Geyser consumes all Tidal Power. Both the initial damage and damage over time portions of this power will be increased and have a scaling chance to disorient for each stack of Tidal Power. If you have 3 stacks of Tidal Power, Geyser will have a 100% chance to disorient affected targets. Damage: High & High DoT, Recharge: Very Slow
Geyser.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), High DMG(Fire/Smash), Foe High DoT(Fire), -Speed, Knock Up, Disorient, Self -Tidal Power
Geyser.display_target_help: Your movement speed has been reduced by the Geyser

Water_Jet_Normal.display_help: You spray a concentrated torrent of water at short range toward your target that causes High Cold and Smashing damage as well as reducing your target's movement speed. If you have 2 or less Tidal Power, you will gain a stack of Tidal Power. If you have 3 Tidal Power and you activate this power, it will have an enhanced effect causing Water Jet to cast slightly faster and immediately reset the recharge of Water Jet. Water Jet's enhanced effect can be used once every 15 seconds. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Water_Jet_Normal.display_short_help: Short, High DMG(Cold/Smash), Foe -Speed, Self +/-Tidal Power
Water_Jet_Normal.display_target_help: Your speed is reduced by the Water Jet.

Water_Jet_Fast.display_help: You spray a concentrated torrent of water at short range toward your target that causes High Cold and Smashing damage as well as reducing your target's movement speed. If you have 2 or less Tidal Power, you will gain a stack of Tidal Power. If you have 3 Tidal Power and you activate this power, it will have an enhanced effect causing Water Jet to cast slightly faster and immediately reset the recharge of Water Jet. Water Jet's enhanced effect can be used once every 8 seconds. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Water_Jet_Fast.display_short_help: Short, High DMG(Cold/Smash), Foe -Speed, Self +/-Tidal Power
Water_Jet_Fast.display_target_help: Your speed is reduced by the Water Jet.

NW_Mask_Presence.display_help: Mask Presence makes you almost impossible to detect. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Like most stealth powers, Mask Presence cannot be used at the same time as other Concealment powers.

Mental_Training.display_help: Your mental training allows you to focus your will, allowing you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.
Mental_Training.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.

NW_Mind_Link.display_help: Your Mind Link Power will enable you to link the minds of all your teammates who are near you for the next 90 seconds. This shared link improves your team's chance to hit foes, your defensive abilities and dramatically reduces psionic damage. Recharge: Long
NW_Mind_Link.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, Defense and Psionic Resistance improve due to the Mind Link.
NW_Mind_Link.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's chance to hit, Defense and Psionic Resistance.
NW_Mind_Link.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's chance to hit, Defense and Psionic Resistance with their {PowerName}.

Placate.display_help: Allow you to trick a foe to no longer attack you. A Successful Placate will also grant you stealth. However, if you attack a Placated Foe, he will be able to attack you back. Recharge: Long

NW_Tactical_Training:_Vengeance.display_help: The loss of a comrade enrages the team. When a teammate is defeated in combat, activate this power to grant you and your teammates a bonus to chance to hit, Damage and Defense to all attacks. A Vengeful team has no fear, and Vengeance protects you and your Teammates from Fear effects. It also gives you and your team great resistance to Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Immobilize, Confuse, Taunt, Placate and Knockback. This power does not stack with multiple castings.
NW_Tactical_Training:_Vengeance.display_target_help: You have been inspired to Vengeance by a natural leader. Your chance to hit, Damage and Defense to melee, ranged, smashing and lethal attacks are all increased and you are resistant to Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Immobilize, Confuse, Taunt, Placate and Knockback.
NW_Tactical_Training:_Vengeance.display_victim_hit: You fallen teammate has inspired you with {PowerName}.

Elude.display_help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height and Endurance Recovery are also increased. Elude also grants you high resistance to Defense DeBuffs. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
Elude.display_attacker_hit: You are now extremely Elusive, and almost impossible to hit.

Poison_Dart.display_help: Poison Dart does moderate damage to your foe, then poisons them. The poison does toxic damage over time and reduces their regeneration rate. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Fast
Poison_Dart.display_target_help: You have been hit by a Poison Dart. You cannot Regenerate you wounds while you take damage from this poison.

Swipe.display_help: Swipe does light lethal damage to your foe, then poisons them. The poison does toxic damage over time and slows their recovery rate and movement speed. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Night Widow or Fortunata Mask Presence power. Damage: Light Recharge: Fast
Swipe.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Lunge.display_help: Strike does high lethal damage to your foe, then poisons them. The poison does toxic damage over time and slows their recovery rate and movement speed. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Night Widow or Fortunata Mask Presence power. Damage: High Recharge: Slow
Lunge.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Dart_Burst.display_help: Dart Burst does light lethal damage to foes in a 30 degree arc cone, then poisons them. The poison does toxic damage over time and reduces their regeneration rate. Damage: Light Recharge: Medium
Dart_Burst.display_target_help: You have been hit by a Poison Dart. You cannot Regenerate you wounds while you take damage from this poison.

Follow_Up.display_help: You perform a feint attack that deals moderate damage. After this attack hits, it gives you a large bonus to your chance to hit and damage for a brief time. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Night Widow or Fortunata Mask Presence power, additionally if you select this power, you may not also select Build Up. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Follow_Up.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} attack has increased you attack and damage for a short duration.

Spin.display_help: Spin does moderate lethal damage to all foes within an 8' radius of you, then poisons them. The poison does toxic damage over time and slows their recovery rate and movement speed. NOTE: This power may deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Night Widow or Fortunata Mask Presence power. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Slow
Spin.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Strike.display_help: Lunge does high lethal damage to your foe, then poisons them. The poison does toxic damage over time and slows their recovery rate and movement speed. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Night Widow or Fortunata Mask Presence power. Damage: High Recharge: Slow
Strike.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.
